data.actual_result: Window changes size correctly but chat scrolls back several pages. Moving back and forth will jump back further.
data.expected_result: Window changes size but nothing else.
data.short_description: Chat jumps when having different scale on different screens
data.steps_to_repro: - Have two monitors connected. - Go to Windows Settings > System > Display > Scale and Layout - Set one monitor to e.g. 150% - Move discord window between screens
